attributes.additional_details:
Kevin Sinfield has worked tirelessly (literally!) fundraising for Motor Neuron Disease, since his team mate and friend, Rob Burrow was afflicted.

He's raised millions and put himself through all sorts of personal hell and challenges, to raise money and more importantly, raise awareness of MND.

The man is inspirational and seems to be missed from the honours list time and again. This is wrong and needs changed
#wewantsirkev
attributes.background: Get Kevin Sinfield on the honours list.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
